message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $160. It's worth more than its price tag and I believe it will provide great value to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the value you're offering, $160 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go right now. I'd be happy to pay $145 for the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I am willing to consider your offer. For $145, I am confident that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
